SI.POV.URHC.sourceOrganization: World Bank, Global Poverty Working Group. Data are based on World Bank's country poverty assessments and country Poverty Reduction Strategies.
SI.POV.URHC.name: Urban poverty headcount ratio at national poverty lines (% of urban population)
SI.POV.URHC.sourceNote: World Bank, Global Poverty Working Group. Data are compiled from official government sources or are computed by World Bank staff using national (i.e. country–specific) poverty lines.
